```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
source(file.path("R", "functions.R"))
library(distilltools)
library(tidyverse)

# Read in projects csv file 
projects <- readr::read_csv(here::here("content", "projects.csv"))

# Unite categories in projects
categories <- get_categories(projects)
projects <- projects %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    names_to = "categories", 
    values_to = "val", 
    cols = categories) %>% 
  mutate(val = ifelse(val == 1, categories, NA_character_)) %>% 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = categories, 
    values_from = val) %>% 
  unite(
    -c('title', 'src', 'url', 'description'), 
    col = "categories", sep = " ", na.rm = T)
```
